summary: Ever think its a bit lore-breaking that you can make the legendary Dwarven Armor and Weapons, which no one else can do, at level 30 smithing? This mod makes it a bit more immersive.
descriptionHtml:
Ever think its a bit lore-breaking that you can make the legendary Dwarven Armor and Weapons, which no one else can do, at level 30 smithing?

This mod makes it a bit more immersive, as you need not only level 30 smithing, and the Dwarven Smithing perk, but you also need to complete the quest Unfathomable Depths and get the Ancient Knowledge Perk.

There are two versions, one for Vanilla, and one for Dawnguard (for the Dwarven Arrows).

As I don\'t know how to make a patch for other mods, with dwarven items in them, you can simply edit the mod in the Creation Kit. Simply find the crafting file, and add the requirement:

HasSpell - MS04Reward

If you do know how to make a crafting patch for other mods, PM me and I\'ll upload it on this page.
author: IronDusk33
